strategy.trend_analysis: Incorporates broad educational and STEM tags, niche tags for specific mathematical concepts (topology, Cantor set), and aims to capitalize on the growing trend of edutainment and creative learning formats on Instagram. 'FamilyGuyStyle' and 'MemeMath' are included to tap into popular entertainment trends and make the content shareable.
strategy.engagement_strategy: Employs engagement-focused hashtags like #LearnWithMe, #WhatDoYouThink, and #ShareTheKnowledge to encourage user interaction, comments, and organic spread. The primary and niche tags will attract users actively searching for specific educational content, while broad tags increase general discoverability.

usage_tips: Mix and match hashtag categories for optimal reach and relevance.
Observe the performance of each hashtag over time and adjust your strategy accordingly.
Consider adding location-specific hashtags if relevant to your audience.
Don't exceed Instagram's limit of 30 hashtags to avoid appearing spammy.
Place hashtags in the caption or the first comment for best visibility.

generation_metadata.topic: EPISODE 6: Power-Up Dragon Mathematics!! Show this as HUGE ANIMATED TITLE CARD at the beginning for 3 seconds with epic effects! Create a Family Guy style comedy where baby dragon in power-up workshop teaches rational and real exponents, then explores topology. Cover fractional powers, real exponents as limits, accumulation points, isolated points, open and closed sets, interior and closure, and the Cantor set. Use visual metaphors: power transformations, dragon gatherings, bubble zones, fractal magic. Make topology concepts accessible and fun.
